message.content: This question requires an understanding of the role of decomposers in the ecosystem. Dead organisms serve as a source of nutrients for decomposers. Decomposers break down the organic matter of dead organisms and release nutrients back into the environment, allowing them to be recycled and used by other organisms. Option (B) is incorrect because pride is not a source of anything for decomposers. Option (C) is unrelated to decomposers. Option (D) is incorrect because decomposers do not rely on people as a source of nutrients.
